name: Create FreshBooks clients from new rows in Microsoft 365 Excel
description: Every time a new row in Microsoft 365 Excel  is created, Make will create a FreshBooks client out of it. To make sure the scenario works fine check if your Worksheet corresponds to this (example)[https://dnu-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/g/personal/ivanov_d_donnu_edu_ua1/ES9VSWoPRF9Ku3JhmuiFXeMBcmgcFIFoqhbzHKM6KSCqdA?e=GjAldp].
